description:
![screenshot of tetris](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/master/tetris-java/tetris_screenshot.png)
	
Tetris clone written in Java.

##How to play ?

* SPACE - Start a new game
* LEFT - Move the current shape to the left
* RIGHT - Move the current shape to the right
* DOWN - Move the current shape down
* UP - Rotate the current shape clockwise
* CTRL - "Hard drop" current shape
* P - Pause the current game
* M - Mute sound
* PAGE UP - Increase the volume
* PAGE DOWN - Decrease the volume

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/tetris-java/readme.md)**
